longBusinessSummary: Black Mountain Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Black Mountain Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Fort Worth, Texas.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jacob  Smith CPA
companyOfficers.title: CFO, Chief Accounting Officer, Sec. & Director
